original_title: The BellRays: La Musicale N°8 Live
overview: Recorded for Canal+ TV's La Musicale series in France, Riverside, California's BellRays rip through four songs promoting the 2006 album, Have A Little Faith. Tracks: "Third Time's the Charm", "Tell the Lie", "Everyday I Think of You", and "Detroit Breakdown".
title: The BellRays: La Musicale N°8 Live
